sqlMap.select: SELECT PURCHS_SN, PURCHS_DE, TOT_SETLE_AMOUNT, REAL_SETLE_AMOUNT, USE_POINT , CRTFC_NO, SETLE_DT, SETLE_IP, ESNTL_ID, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT FROM TB_PURCHS P WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#
SELECT PURCHS_SN, CART_SN FROM TB_PURCHS_GOODS P WHERE PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn#
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_PURCHS P WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT P.PURCHS_SN, P.PURCHS_DE, P.TOT_SETLE_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT A.PURCHS_SN, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT P.PURCHS_SN FROM TB_PURCHS P WHERE 1= 1
ORDER BY P.PURCHS_SN DESC ) A ) B INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS P ON B.PURCHS_SN = P.PURCHS_SN WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startIdx# AND #endIdx# ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT G.FILE_CODE, P.PURCHS_SN, P.PURCHS_DE, P.TOT_SETLE_AMOUNT, CG.CART_SN, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_CODE , CG.TOUR_DE, CG.CHKIN_DE, CG.CHCKT_DE, CG.BEGIN_TIME, CG.END_TIME, G.CL_SE, CG.PURCHS_AMOUNT , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_PURCHS_REVIEW WHERE PURCHS_SN = P.PURCHS_SN AND CART_SN = CG.CART_SN AND GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END EXISTREVIEW , MIN(CASE WHEN TOUR_DE IS NULL THEN CHKIN_DE ELSE TOUR_DE END) OVER() AS BEGINDT, MAX(CASE WHEN TOUR_DE IS NULL THEN CHCKT_DE ELSE TOUR_DE END) OVER() AS ENDDT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(CASE WHEN TOUR_DE IS NULL THEN CHCKT_DE ELSE TOUR_DE END) OVER(), 'YYYYMMDD') + 14, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REVIEWDT FROM TB_PURCHS P INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS_GOODS PG ON P.PURCHS_SN = PG.PURCHS_SN INNER JOIN TB_CART_GOODS CG ON PG.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN INNER JOIN TB_GOODS G ON CG.GOODS_CODE = G.GOODS_CODE WHERE P.PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# ORDER BY CG.CART_SN

SELECT P.REAL_SETLE_AMOUNT, P.PURCHS_DE FROM TB_PURCHS P INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS_GOODS PG ON P.PURCHS_SN = PG.PURCHS_SN INNER JOIN TB_CART_GOODS CG ON PG.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN WHERE P.PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# AND PG.CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_PURCHS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y', DELETE_ID = #esntl_id#, DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT P.PURCHS_SN, P.ESNTL_ID, P.PURCHS_DE FROM TB_PURCHS P WHERE P.PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn#

SELECT CG.CART_SN, CG.TOUR_DE, CG.BEGIN_TIME, CG.END_TIME, CG.CHKIN_DE, CG.CHCKT_DE, GOODS.GOODS_NM , FN_GET_PURCHS_OPTION(CG.CART_SN) AS OPTIONS, GOODS.GOODS_CODE, CG.FLIGHT_SN, GOODS.CL_SE , PG.PICKUP_PLACE, PG.DROP_PLACE, PG.USE_NMPR, PG.USE_PD FROM TB_PURCHS P INNER JOIN TB_PURCHS_GOODS PG ON P.PURCHS_SN = PG.PURCHS_SN INNER JOIN TB_CART_GOODS CG ON PG.CART_SN = CG.CART_SN INNER JOIN TB_GOODS GOODS ON CG.GOODS_CODE = GOODS.GOODS_CODE WHERE P.PURCHS_SN = #purchs_sn# ORDER BY CASE WHEN CG.TOUR_DE IS NULL THEN CG.CHKIN_DE ELSE CG.TOUR_DE END, CG.BEGIN_TIME, CG.CHKIN_DE

SELECT CG.CART_SN, CG.TOUR_DE, CG.BEGIN_TIME, CG.END_TIME, CG.CHKIN_DE, CG.CHCKT_DE, GOODS.GOODS_NM , FN_GET_PURCHS_OPTION(CG.CART_SN) AS OPTIONS, GOODS.GOODS_CODE, CG.FLIGHT_SN, GOODS.CL_SE , '' AS PICKUP_PLACE, '' AS DROP_PLACE, '' AS USE_NMPR, '' AS USE_PD FROM TB_CART_GOODS CG INNER JOIN TB_GOODS GOODS ON CG.GOODS_CODE = GOODS.GOODS_CODE WHERE CG.CART_SN IN ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR ( #cart_sn#, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL ) CART_SN FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= REGEXP_COUNT ( #cart_sn#, ',' ) + 1 ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN CG.TOUR_DE IS NULL THEN CG.CHKIN_DE ELSE CG.TOUR_DE END, CG.BEGIN_TIME, CG.CHKIN_DE
